availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William M Miller (Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary B. "Polly" Mitchell in Ohio County, Kentucky, on March 27, 1828. Father of John Miller, David Miller, William Miller, Martha Miller, Robert Miller, Mary Miller, Wesley P. Miller, Dorcas A. Miller, James Miller, Judith Miller, Cicero Miller, and Giles C. Miller. Farmer in Ohio County in 1850. Farmer in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, District 1, p. 35B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Caney, p. 714.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Caney, p. 353B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, X County Marriages, Film #000494956, p. 181.
"William Makel "Make" Miller (1806-1886)," Find A Grave, Memorial #21336652, accessed October 22, 2021, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/21336652.
